scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./server/ && npm run build" "cd ./context/ && npm run build"
scripts.prepublishOnly: concurrently "cd ./server/ && npm run build" "cd ./context/ && npm run build"
scripts.postinstall: cd ./server/ && npm install && cd ../context/ && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "wait-on http://localhost:7637 && electron ." "cd ./server/ && npm run build && npm run start"
